title: R-Tools R-Drive Image v6.0.6006 Multilingual
description:
R-Tools R-Drive Image v6.0.6006

R-Drive Image is a potent utility providing disk image files
creation for backup or duplication purposes.
Using R-Drive Image, you can completely and rapidly restore your
system after heavy data loss. You can also use R-Drive Image for
mass system deployment when you need to setup many identical
computers.

Languages:
English, German, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese,
Chinese.


Release Notes v6.0.6006:

Improvements:
Startup version:
Linux kernel 4.1.3
Improved recognition for BIOS RAIDs

Bugfixes:
Sometimes an image file might be created incorrectly for ext4fs
disks with the 1024-Byte block size. Fixed.


System Requirements

An Intel-compatible platform running Windows 2000/XP/ 2003/Vista/2008/Windows 7/8/8.1 / Windows Server 2012 (including 64 bits editions).
The administrative privileges are required to install and run R-Drive Image under Win2000/XP/ 2003/Vista/2008/Windows 7/8/8.1 /




Installation:


Unpack, install the application.

Extract patch.rar to the installation directory, overwriting
existing files.

Choose any name/company and use our Keygen to register the
application.

Do not use the update check option.


NOTE:

The patch only patches the ECDSA public key.

Enjoy a fully licensed copy, including the OEM Kit
